meanings.definition: The quality or state of being contradictory.
meanings.sent1: Her speech had a contradictoriness that confused everyone.
meanings.sent2: The contradictoriness of his actions left us puzzled.
meanings.sent3: The contradictoriness of the weather forecast made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The contradictoriness of his promises was like a tangled web.
meanings.sent5: The contradictoriness of the situation was like trying to hold water in a sieve.

meanings.definition: The act or instance of contradicting.
meanings.sent1: His contradictoriness in the meeting caused a stir.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't ignore the contradictoriness in her argument.
meanings.sent3: The contradictoriness of the cat pretending to be a dog was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The contradictoriness of the traffic signals led to chaos.
meanings.sent5: The contradictoriness of his excuses was as clear as day.
